com.alexkasko.tasks
Interface TaskManager<T extends Task>

public interface TaskManager<T extends Task>

DAO interface for tasks

Author:
alexkasko Date: 5/17/12
See Also:
TaskEngine, Task

Method Summary
 Collection<Long> loadSuspendedIds()
          This method will be used to cache all suspended task ids on engine startup.
 Collection<? extends T> markProcessingAndLoad()
          This method is used to load new and resumed tasks to run.
 void updateStage(long taskId, String stage)
          Changes task stage, will be called between stages processing
 void updateStatusDefault(long taskId)
          Changes task status to default, will be called after successful processing of last stage
 void updateStatusError(long taskId, Exception e, String lastCompletedStage)
          Changes task status into "error" and task stage into last completed stage
 void updateStatusSuspended(long taskId)
          Changes task status to default, will be called after on task suspend
 

Method Detail

markProcessingAndLoad

Collection<? extends T> markProcessingAndLoad()
This method is used to load new and resumed tasks to run. All returning tasks should be switched into 'processing' status in DB. It's implementation responsibility to not return tasks that may be running in that moment.

Returns:
collection of tasks to run

loadSuspendedIds

Collection<Long> loadSuspendedIds()
This method will be used to cache all suspended task ids on engine startup.

Returns:
collection of suspended tasks ids

updateStage

void updateStage(long taskId,
                 String stage)
Changes task stage, will be called between stages processing

Parameters:
taskId - task id
stage - new stage

updateStatusDefault

void updateStatusDefault(long taskId)
Changes task status to default, will be called after successful processing of last stage

Parameters:
taskId - task id

updateStatusSuspended

void updateStatusSuspended(long taskId)
Changes task status to default, will be called after on task suspend

Parameters:
taskId - task id

updateStatusError

void updateStatusError(long taskId,
                       Exception e,
                       String lastCompletedStage)
Changes task status into "error" and task stage into last completed stage

Parameters:
taskId - task id
e - exception
lastCompletedStage - name of last completed stage
